title: muruga muruga
sahitya: murugA murugA murugAcaraNam 1 varuvAi mayil mIDinilE vaDivEluDanE varuvAi taruvAi nalamundAgavum  pugazhum tavamum tiramum dhanamum ghanamumcaraNam 2  aDiyAr palaringuLarE avarai viDuvittaruvAimuDiyA maraiyin muDivE asurar muDivE karudum vaDivElavanEcaraNam 3  karudip-poruLE varuga tuNivE kanalE varugakarudik-karudik-kavalaippaDuvAr kavalaik-kaDalaik-kaDiyum vaDivElcaraNam 4  amarAvati vAzhvuravE aruLvAi sharaNam sharaNamkumarA piNi yAvaiyumE shidarak-kumurum shuDar vElavanE sharaNamcaraNam 5  arivAghiya kOyililE aruLAghiya tAi maDimElpori vEluDanE vaLarvAi aDiyAr pudu vAzhvuravE bhuvi mIdaruLvAicaraNam 6  guruvE paraman maghanE guhaiyil vaLarum kanalEtaruvAi tozhilum payanum amarar samarAdiyanE sharaNam sharaNam     Meaning: O lord Muruga, let me see you seated on your peacock, with your spear,please grant us all glory, peace and prosperity Many a devotee of yours is here, please liberate usYou, an end to the endless, as to the demons You, the basis of thought, the fire and courage, please show yourself to meYou who destroys the basis of all worry, let me see you, O Lord! Grant me the life immortal, I bow to youYou shatter all our  troubles, I surrender to you, our LightIn the temple of wisdom, on the lap of mother Grace,May you appear with your spear, to give new life to your devotees, on earthO teacher! the son of Lord Siva,the flame in the caveGrant us toil and its fruits, O immortal Lord, I surrender to you
